content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is continuous on the interval <math alttext="negative 2, is less than x, is less than 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and is not continuous on the interval <math alttext="negative 2, is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following could not be an expression for <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator x plus 2, and denominator x minus 5, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator x minus 5, and denominator x plus 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 1, and denominator open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, x plus 2, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x minus 5, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
